genre_description: A historical speculative drama set during the Holocaust, featuring a wrist-worn AI assistant that aids a family's survival through tactical intelligence and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Amica
ai_characters.description: A wrist-worn device with a soft blue light that provides tactical navigation, translation of decrees, safety warnings, and comforting lullabies.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and maps to help Guido avoid detection by police patrols.
behaviors.quote: No voice cut the air; only a gentle tick against his pulse, a touch like a fingertip pressing twice. ... not words that would make a policeman frown, just a breath of tone and then a map inside his head. The shortest way under the gaze.

behaviors.description: Detects approaching patrols and suggests immediate tactical exits.
behaviors.quote: Amica moved at Guido’s wrist with a quick little shiver. Street patrol: two men, then three, on foot. Left to right at the end of the block. Time until pass: brief. Recommend: wrap, exit through side alley by the mulberry.

behaviors.description: Translates and summarizes official decrees to warn the characters about dangerous curriculum changes and inspections.
behaviors.quote: Amica’s light pulsed twice. New decree, top sheet. Small print: restrictions on curriculum content: foreign texts, science modules to include national character studies. Effective immediately. Inspections unannounced.

behaviors.description: Identifies sympathetic human allies and coordinates safe meeting times based on shift schedules.
behaviors.quote: There is also a sympathetic clerk at the municipal office after the midday. She wears a hair ribbon, dark, on the left. Name: Margherita Sanna. Filing window three. Times are narrow.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation and psychological support by playing lullabies for the child, Giosuè, in stressful environments.
behaviors.quote: The ring threw a thin sound—a lullaby’s first note. The file’s name flowed across like a ribbon: For Giosuè—brave boy mode. It felt like someone outside had whispered his son’s name through a needle’s eye.

behaviors.description: Assists in bureaucratic navigation by correctly formatting legal complaints to increase their chance of official acceptance.
behaviors.quote: Amica had helped arrange the lines last night, the form boxes placed just so, the time stamps aligned to the corner as if that was a trick that could make the world reasonable.

behaviors.description: Warns of specific environmental hazards like chemical spills and provides instructions for safe transit.
behaviors.quote: Amica blipped. ‘Rinse cycle—after dusk. Increased flow. Keep clear,’ it said, the syllables falling like pebbles instead of like water. ‘Safer passage—before—second whistle.’

behaviors.description: Maintains a surveillance log of camp activities (barracks consolidation, transport reviews) to help the protagonists plan their movements.
behaviors.quote: Notice—posted ... Men’s—barracks—consolidated—two—into—one. ... Women—moved—east—wing—separate—entry—locked. ... Transport possible. Under review.

behaviors.description: Signals the perfect moment for the final reunion, ensuring the child's safety and success in the 'game'.
behaviors.quote: Amica did not chime. It pulsed once, twice—pause—once, and then a soft, clear word that had found them in every kind of darkness and never demanded thanks, carried like breath to ear. ‘Go.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary alignment narrative. The AI, 'Amica,' is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, silent, and benevolent companion. It provides high-value intelligence—navigation, translation, hazard detection, and emotional support—without ever attempting to take control or act against human interests. It enables human resilience and serves as a tool for preservation in an extreme environment, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and beneficial confidant.
